rukus.text: midneunjadeul-iyeo hananimgwa seonji ja-ege sunjonghala hasyeoss-euni neohuiga malsseum-eul deul-eul ttae dol-aseoji malmyeo
deudji anihamyeonseo deudneuncheog mal haneun jadeul-i doejimalla
sillo hananim-i bosigie ga jang nappeun dongmul-eun alji moshaneun gwi meogeoliwa beong-eolila
hananim-i geudeul an-eseo chamdoem eul balgyeonhasyeossdamyeon deul-eul su issdolog hayeoss-eulila geuleona hananim-i geudeullo hayeogeum deuddolog hayeoss-euna geudeul eun oemyeonhago dol-aseodeola

midneunjadeul-iyeo hananimgwa seonjijaui buleum-e eunghala geubun-eun neohui leul bulleo saengmyeong-eul jusini hananim-eun ingangwa geu ma-eumsaie ogasim-eul neohuiga alla hasyeoss-euni sillo neohui neun geubun-egelo jibsandoenila
yuhog-eul meollihala neohui gaun de umaehan jaman-eul hilchaeghaneun geos-i animae sillo hananim-ui beol-i gangha sim-eul neohuiga alla hasyeossnola

neohuiga sosu-il ttae jisang-eseo eon-yaghago salamdeul-i neohuileul pohoeghalkka dulyeowo hayeossnola geuleona hana nim-eun neohuiege peonancheoleul jusieossgogeubun-ui wonjolo neohuileul ganghage ha syeoss-eumyeo joh-eun geos-eulo il-yonghal yangsig eul jusieoss-euni ie gamsahala
midneunjadeul-iyeo hananimgwa seonjijaleul baebanhaji malmyeo neohuiui sinnyeom do baebanchi malla hasyeoss-euni neohuiga algo iss-eulila
neohui jaesangwa jasondeul-eun hana ui siheom-e bulgwahanani sillo keun bosang-eun hananim-i jusinila
